item.title: Monthly news - September 2025
item.description:
Microsoft DefenderMonthly news - September 2025 Edition
This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month across our Defender products. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from August 2025. Defender for Cloud has it's own Monthly News post, have a look at their blog space.
New Virtual Ninja Show episodes:
Announcing Microsoft Sentinel data lake. Inside the new Phishing Triage Agent in Security Copilot.
Microsoft Defender
Public Preview items in advanced hunting:
